description: Fix CLI version comparison for prerelease versions
changelog:
**Bug Fixes:**
- fix: CLI startup incorrectly reports rc version as older than beta (e.g., 0.3.0-rc.0 < 0.3.0-beta.16)
- fix: deduplicate compareVersions â€” extract to shared utils/compare-versions.ts (was duplicated 3x with inconsistent implementations)

**Root Cause:**
- cli/index.ts used a simplified compareVersions that ignored prerelease identifiers, parsing "0.3.0-rc.0" as [0, 3, 0, 0] and "0.3.0-beta.16" as [0, 3, 0, 16], concluding rc < beta
- commands/update.ts and migrations/index.ts had the correct full implementation but it was not shared
notes: No migration required. Hotfix for version comparison bug introduced in rc.0.
